Module com.example.rupizzeria
Package com.example.rupizzeria

Class StoreOrdersController

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizzeria.SecondaryViewController
com.example.rupizzeria.StoreOrdersController
public class StoreOrdersController extends SecondaryViewController
Controller for the StoreOrders View. Allows for viewing, cancelling, and exporting orders in the store.

    • initData

    • start

      public void start()
      A function to initialize the stage AFTER initData is called. This makes the class not extend the Intializable class.

    • onOrderNumClick

      public void onOrderNumClick()
      Refreshes the page with the appropriate order. Calls the refresh() method to retrieve data from the orderBox.

    • onCancelClick

      public void onCancelClick()
      Cancels the currently selected order and refreshes. Handles edge case where there are no orders.

    • onExportClick

      public void onExportClick() throws IOException
      Calls the .export() method in StoreOrders to export the orders locally
      Throws:
      IOException
